text: Khaled Mashud () (born February 8, 1976 in Rajshahi) is a Bangladeshi cricketer. He was a wicketkeeper, also a middle order batsman. He was a regular member of the national team between 1995-2007. Former Bangladeshi coach Dav Whatmore said that Khaled Mashud was the best wicket-keeper in Asia. : Cricinfo player profile (Retrieved on 2008-10-03) ==Reference== Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Bangladeshi cricketers Category:People from Rajshahi Division
title: Khaled Mashud
